name: knowsheet-repl
description: A Read-Eval-Print-Loop (REPL) to demonstrate the KnowSheet Bricks C++ syntax.

scripts.coverage: istanbul cover _mocha -- test/**/*.js --ui exports --reporter spec --recursive --grep '@disabled' --invert && open coverage/lcov-report/index.html

author: John Babak <babak.john@gmail.com>
